item.title: cmake 模板
item.description: Cmake模板 cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1) project(PROJECT_XXX VERSION 0.0.0.0 ) #C/C++标准 set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 14) set(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 11) #设置编译器 set (CMAKE_C_COMPILER "/usr/bin/gcc") set (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "/usr/bin/g++") #lib&&bin set(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib) set(EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bin) #release debug set(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE Debug#[[Release | Debug| RelWithDebInfo |MinSizeRel]]) #add_compile_options
